text:
In Monday's #LNP: @UPMC Lititz doctor sets example to show people of color that #COVID19 #vaccine is safe; Lancaster Farm Sanctuary and Heritage Creek Farm Camp are locked in dispute over shared driveway; @DrumsEtc among the businesses to close in 2020.
